creator: COMOQUIERAS
title: Let's Make BMP180-LCD (Arduino)
description: This project aims to display temperature factors from a BMP180 sensor on an LCD screen using an Arduino UNO.
steps: Connect the LCD and BMP180 to the Arduino UNO and the protoboard.

Import the downloaded library into the Arduino IDE by navigating to 'Programa' -> 'Incluir Libreria' -> 'Añadir Libreria .ZIP' and selecting the library file (BMP180_Breakout_Arduino_Library-master.zip).
Open the 'BMP180_altitude_example' from the 'Sparkfun BMP 180' example folder.
Open the 'Hello World' example code for the Liquid Crystal Display (LCD).
Copy the 'LiquidCrystal' initialization lines from the 'Hello World' code and paste them below the first two include lines in the 'BMP180_altitude_example' code.
Merge the 'void setup()' sections of both codes into the 'BMP180_altitude_example' code.
Replace all instances of 'Serial' with 'lcd' in the combined code to output to the LCD.
